channel.title: Why do
channel.description:
Only some of my npcs move?
I have made Tzhaar NPC's and put this for example:
[code] spawn = 2591 2450 5146 0 2453 5149 2447 5143 2 TzHaar-Mej [/code]
And i have made this Dust Devil:
[code] spawn = 1624 3220 9382 0 3220 9382 3223 9380 2 Dust Devil [/code]
And this Zammy Mage:
[code] spawn = 2258 3104 3557 0 3104 3557 3110 3561 2 Zammy Mage [/code]
But the Zammy Mage & Dust Devil don't walk about..
Why?

item.title: Why do
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Only some of my npcs move?

I have made Tzhaar NPC’s and put this for example:

spawn = 2591	2450	5146	0	2453	5149	2447	5143	2	TzHaar-Mej

And i have made this Dust Devil:

spawn = 1624	3220	9382	0	3220	9382	3223	9380	2	Dust Devil

And this Zammy Mage:

spawn = 2258	3104	3557	0	3104	3557	3110	3561	2	Zammy Mage

But the Zammy Mage & Dust Devil don’t walk about…

Why?

Read full topic
